title: Coffee-shop-sales Analysis
description: This project is a Power BI dashboard that shows the sales performance of a coffee shop with multiple store locations. It helps understand how the business is doing by analyzing sales, customer visits, top products, and buying patterns.

title: Superstore-sales Analysis
description: This Power BI dashboard provides a detailed analysis of product performance across different categories, regions, and markets. It helps businesses track sales, discounts, quantity, and market behavior to make data-driven decisions.
